Paragraph: Vincristine , dexamethasone , and polyethylene glycol - asparaginase were also administered before the episode as part of induction therapy .

2. Dexamethasone
3. Polyethylene glycol - asparaginase

These are all chemical compounds that are used as medications or drugs. Vincristine and dexamethasone are both synthetic chemicals, while polyethylene glycol - asparaginase is a conjugate of polyethylene glycol, a synthetic polymer, and asparaginase, an enzyme.
